description: Turn fried rice into golden, crispy patties for the kids' lunch boxes with this easy recipe. This nutritionally approved school lunch is easy to assemble.
name: Fried Rice Patties Lunch Box Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Woolworths frozen baby peas, thawed
0.5 small red capsicum, deseeded, finely chopped
1 Woolworths free range egg, lightly beaten
2 medium croc egg plums, halved, destoned, cut into wedges
40g light tasty cheddar, cut into 1.5cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Break up rice and place in a medium bowl. Add peas, onion and capsicum, then stir to combine. Add flour and stir to combine. Add egg and soy, then stir to combine.

Spray a large frying pan with oil and heat over medium heat. Spoon 1/4 cupfuls of mixture into pan. Flatten slightly. Cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate to cool. Place patties in lunch box.
Serve with carrots, plum and cheese as snacks.
